address: Phường Pú Trạng, Thị xã Nghĩa Lộ, Tỉnh Yên Bái
thought:
**Analysis of Administrative Unit Change for "Phường Pú Trạng, Thị xã Nghĩa Lộ, Tỉnh Yên Bái"**

Okay, here's my thought process on finding the new administrative unit for the old address "Phường Pú Trạng, Thị xã Nghĩa Lộ, Tỉnh Yên Bái".  First, I recognized that "Tỉnh Yên Bái" is the starting point.  I immediately consulted relevant province resolutions (specifically 60-NQ/TW) to understand any changes.  I found that "Tỉnh Yên Bái" had been merged with "Tỉnh Lào Cai" to form a new province named "Tỉnh Lào Cai."

Next, I focused on "Phường Pú Trạng."  I systematically searched through available resolutions, specifically looking for any mentions of this ward. I located a crucial resolution, "1673/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lào Cai". Within that resolution, line 82 explicitly states that "Phường Pú Trạng" was part of a consolidation. It was merged, along with other wards, to form a new ward called "**phường Nghĩa Lộ**."

Now that I've found a candidate for the new ward, I checked the "New wards" section to verify its existence and to gather additional details.  I confirmed that "Phường Nghĩa Lộ" exists under the new province "Tỉnh Lào Cai," and I was able to find the ward code and name information.

Since the old ward is explicitly mapped to the new ward in the resolution, I'm confident in this mapping.  My final output would be a JSON object containing the following key pieces of information: the citation for the relevant resolution, the specific line that contains the ward mapping, a "high" confidence level because of the clear mapping, and details on the new province and ward.  Since this is a straightforward, one-to-one mapping, no other potential candidates need to be considered. I have verified that "Thị xã Nghĩa Lộ" has been properly omitted, per the instructions in the prompt. I think this is a high quality response.

citation.header: 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lào Cai
citation.line: 82. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của phường Tân An, phường Pú Trạng, xã Nghĩa An và xã Nghĩa Sơn thành phường mới có tên gọi là phường Nghĩa Lộ.
